summary: This is an email from an attorney (likely a prosecutor) indicating they are currently on trial before Judge Ronnie Abrams and providing contact information for urgent matters related to the United States v. Epstein case, directing inquiries to AUSA Maurene Comey and AUSA Alex Rossmiller.

persons.name: Ronnie Abrams
persons.context: Presiding over the trial where the email sender is currently involved.

persons.name: Maurene Comey
persons.context: Designated contact for immediate assistance regarding the United States v. Epstein case.

persons.name: Alex Rossmiller
persons.context: Designated contact for all other matters not related to the urgent Epstein case inquiries.

connections.description: Both are Assistant United States Attorneys (AUSAs) referenced as contacts for different types of inquiries.

events.title: Attorney on trial before Judge Abrams
events.description: The email sender states they are currently on trial before Judge Ronnie Abrams and will be checking email at the end of each trial day.

keyFacts: The email is dated August 26, 2019, during the period of Jeffrey Epstein's federal prosecution.
It references the criminal case 'United States v. Epstein, 19 Cr. 490 (RMB)'.
It provides contact instructions for urgent matters related to the Epstein case to AUSA Maurene Comey and for other matters to AUSA Alex Rossmiller.
